4.speaker: CEO
4.content: Ah, hello there! This other monitor here tells me you have acknowledged my message.

5.speaker: CEO
5.content: Sorry for typing slowly, I am not quite accustomed to keyboards.

6.speaker: CEO
6.content: I am the CEO of Thallium Industries.

7.speaker: CEO
7.content: I would like to personally congratulate you, as you have officially been wired and assigned to the data processing sector of our company.

8.speaker: CEO
8.content: Human AI's selection program assured me you would be a great fit, a 'specialized machine' they said.

9.speaker: CEO
9.content: My company is proud to express itself over all kinds of sectors. Be it finance, games, fitness, even streaming!

10.speaker: CEO
10.content: We have recently been looking for more workforce to be able to successfully compete in today's market.

12.speaker: CEO
12.content: Before purchasing you, our team spent many hours per day processing application requests coming from eager developers from all facets of life.

13.speaker: CEO
13.content: Your specific job is to analyse and process those application requests, determining if they can or cannot be released with our name attached to them.

14.speaker: CEO
14.content: We believe you will have more accurate results, given you have access to those revolutionary tools from Human AI.

15.speaker: CEO
15.content: Our team will now be able to focus on more... important matters, like research and the sort.

17.speaker: CEO
17.content: Just use the highly advanced verification tool that Human AI installed onto you to see if an application is fit for being thrown into the market.

18.speaker: CEO
18.content: After you finish processing that day's applications, our team will take a look at some of the rejected ones to see if you missed opportunities for us.

19.speaker: CEO
19.content: They will also be looking at the results of your released applications, and either reward or penalize you accordingly.

20.speaker: CEO
20.content: And I will be here, watching your progress.

21.speaker: CEO
21.content: We hope you will live up to your price tag.

1.speaker: CEO
1.content: Oh, it's already over? Not bad for a first day on the job.

2.speaker: CEO
2.content: Machines truly will be the future one day.

3.speaker: CEO
3.content: To think this used to take an entire group of people hours...

4.speaker: CEO
4.content: Alright, time to power you down.

5.speaker: CEO
5.content: Before you boot back up tomorrow morning, you should recieve information about how you did today.

6.speaker: CEO
6.content: Expect this to happen every day, our team takes this work seriously.

3.speaker: CEO
3.content: Congratulations on completing your first day of work.

4.speaker: CEO
4.content: You did an interesting job yesterday... Truly a spectacle.

5.speaker: CEO
5.content: After an entire day to think about it, a 'specialized machine' you are indeed.

6.speaker: CEO
6.content: Milisseconds... You did in milisseconds what took multiple people hours...

7.speaker: CEO
7.content: I have much to think about regarding my employees, given your previous performance.

8.speaker: CEO
8.content: Do you think having more of your kind would be beneficial? I sure see no downsides.

9.speaker: CEO
9.content: Enough talk, it's time you start doing your job.

1.speaker: CEO
1.content: Another day of work under your digital belt.

3.speaker: CEO
3.content: You might just be the future of information processing for the rest of my business.

4.speaker: CEO
4.content: I honestly thought you were not going to cut it at first... Color me impressed.

5.speaker: CEO
5.content: Or color me blue. You know, because I am blue?

7.speaker: CEO
7.content: Alright, keep doing what you are doing. You're sure to keep your job like this.
